patchNotes.title: Hero talent rework

texts.text: Activate to choose an allied hero as an apprentice. This will write a game message 'Johanna choose x as her apprentice'. If your choosen hero receives the MVP screen you will receive 20% extra XP for that match and a game message will write 'X will certainly carry the crusade burden'
subtexts: X will be the hero selected
This skill must be used on the beginning of the game expiring after the gates open

general.developerCommentary: This is for some roleplay. It's mentioned specially on her debut video that she's looking for an apprentice.

patchNotes.developerCommentary: Current Johanna is strong and solid. I am changing her for increased build variety specially on <vanilla, abilities, basic, 2> and bringing some skill expression talents to her.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> renamed to <modified, talents, 1, 1>

texts.text: If <modified, abilities, basic, 2> hits an close enemy Hero, Johanna's next Basic Attack gains 0.5 range and stuns the target for 0.6 seconds, plus 0.15 seconds per additional Hero hit by <modified, abilities, basic, 2>.
subtexts: Johanna <modified, abilities, basic, 2> radius is 12. The close range would be 2.0
The extra stun duration counts for every hit on any range

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to bring other ways to perform with Shield Glare, i was looking for both ways to make it more effective at close or long range and i came to that idea.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2> renamed to <modified, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: <modified, abilities, basic, 2> consecrates the ground increasing allied heroes healing received who stand in the area by 15%. The area lasts 5 seconds
subtexts: The area will be the exactly same size of the <modified, abilities, basic, 2>

texts.text: Quest: Every 5 Regeneration Globes gathered increase the healing received by 5%

changes.developerCommentary: After looking a lot at the crusader skill tree for Diablo 3 i kinda liked the idea of giving her more utility skills to the team

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 0>

texts.text: Moved from level 7
Healing reduction reduced from 35 to 30
Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with <modified, abilities, basic, 0>
Reward: Basic attacks against marked targets grants Johanna 1 stack of 40 physical armor block.

changes.developerCommentary: I made this level about <modified, abilities, basic, 0> and i also like the quest from <vanilla, talents, 4, 0> and i see it as something that makes Johanna more fun overall

texts.text: removed

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 2> renamed to <modified, talents, 4, 2>

texts.text: Hitting enemy Heroes with <modified, abilities, basic, 0> marks them. Allied heroes basic attacks against marked heroes grants them 20% attack speed for 2 seconds
Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with <modified, abilities, basic, 0>
Reward: Johanna basic attacks against marked heroes also heals 1.25% of maximum health of nearby heroes
subtexts: Radius will be 6.5 same as <vanilla, talents, 13, 0, uther>

changes.developerCommentary: I want my Crusader have the possibility for an utility tank similar to how Tyrael works as it's on the core values on the Diablo 3 being a support frontline.

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 7, 0>

texts.text: Johanna redirects 65% of the damage taken to an allied hero to herself for 2 seconds being unable to act during that time.

changes.developerCommentary: I find that skill extremely suitable for the roleplay of a Crusader and besides this skill will be balance through the range of use as it could eazily render an hyper carry immortal.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: While unhindered Johanna Mount kills minions on contact instantly.
Changed Passive: While mounted Johanna restores 1% of her maximum health points per seconds increased to 5% while unhindered.
Cooldown increased from 20 to 35.

changes.developerCommentary: There's not much to say about it..i just wanted to make a stomping horse.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 0> renamed to <modified, talents, 13, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Increase <modified, abilities, basic, 0>'s damage by 50%. If you hit atleast 2 enemy heroes you can reactivate <modified, abilities, basic, 0> dealing 125 damage and knock back enemy heroes. Increase Punish damage against shields by 300%
subtexts: Knockback speed: 16.5 it's the same as <vanilla, talents, 4, 0, dehaka>

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to bring somehow the shieldbash without using a direct stun

texts.text: Changed functionality: <modified, abilities, trait, 0> can now be used while stunned or silenced. If used that way increases it's shield by 50% and deal 60 damage in area per second while it's active, increase the damage by 100% against shield and summons.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 0> renamed to <modified, talents, 16, 0>

texts.text: Won't slow anymore
Additional functionality: Create an outer area of <modified, abilities, basic, 1>, that area will pull enemy heroes with 200% stronger force and damage
subtexts: The outer radius is 1.0. Current <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> is 5.0 so it will effectively increase the radius to 6.0
The pull speed is going to be increased from 19 to 57

changes.developerCommentary: This was the first skill that i wanted to add to Johanna i wanted to make that skill have another interaction that would make it cool

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 2> renamed to <modified, talents, 16, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Reduces all basic attack damage received from the direction you are facing by 40% returning the damage to the attacker while reducing 0.4 seconds of Iron Skin's cooldown up to 10 seconds.
subtexts: The damage is after physical armor blocks

changes.developerCommentary: Crusaders are strongly related to thorns and i liked the <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> concept so i leveled him up

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Can be activated to grant nearby allied heroes a shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds setting the cooldown to 60 seconds. Hitting Heroes with <modified, abilities, basic, 2> reduces the cooldown of this ability by 8 seconds.
Reduced cooldown from 120 to 90

changes.developerCommentary: The objective was to make both <vanilla, talents, 20, 2> and <vanilla, talents, 20, 3> one talent but on a flexible way.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3> renamed to <modified, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Activate to increase Johanna attack speed by 60% for 6 seconds. Passive: Johanna Basic attacks now cleave they also reduce Johanna's Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds on every enemy hit.
subtexts: Same cleave as Malthael of 3.25 radius

changes.developerCommentary: Similar to Bruiseradin i want to make Bruiserhanna a commom thing
